channel.title: Data and Source Code on NoisyNets
channel.description: Recent content in Data and Source Code on NoisyNets

item.title: Datasets
item.description: Downloading many BGP paths can be a time consuming process. For the sake of reproducibility of research, we have shared the PGR dataset used in the paper Cutting Through the Noise to Infer Autonomous System Topology. The dataset is roughty 122GB in size and includes observations recorded from all available route collectors (44) at for five time periods. Each time period corresponds to 1 day starting from May 1st, 2022 and ending May 5th, 2022.

item.title: Public Repository
item.description: The public repository for this project is available on GitHub released open source on the MIT license.
